channel.title: homepage on Garrett Siegel | Frontend Developer and Graphic Designer
channel.description: Recent content in homepage on Garrett Siegel | Frontend Developer and Graphic Designer

item.title: graphic
item.description: Versatile Graphic & Motion Design: Blending Design Expertise with Front End Development With over six years of professional experience, I have honed my skills in all aspects of graphic design, motion design, animation, and 3D modeling. While my primary focus has shifted to front end development, I continue to work with design to ensure my skills remain up-to-date and relevant. Throughout my full-time and freelance work, I have collaborated with a diverse range of companies and individuals, creating visually stunning and engaging digital experiences.

item.title: web
item.description: Frontend Development: Blending Visual Design and Seamless User Experiences Welcome to the digital space of a dedicated and imaginative frontend web developer with a strong background in visual design. As a professional who has honed their craft in graphic, motion, and 3D design for many years, I have transitioned into web development with great enthusiasm and a commitment to creating stunning visuals and captivating user experiences. Currently, I'm immersing myself in the world of advanced Static Site Generation (SSG) using the powerful Hugo framework and mastering the versatile Golang programming language.
